actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide each taxpayer with a $75 a day deduction.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide each individual taxpayer an itemized income tax deduction for $75 a day. Limits the number of days the deduction may be taken to the number of days Congress is in session.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide each taxpayer with a $75 a day deduction.
